name: Zomblocked
description:
Survive hordes of zombies to get a higher score than me which should be easy considering my high score is 50!

A great party game and good for quickly picking up and playing.

WASD = Move

Scroll Wheel to change weapons

Right click to scope with rifle

Mouse 1 to Fire

Space to jump

If guns not rendering right click until they do. If that still doesn't work Restart the game.

Make sure to avoid the zombies

Early Development
